sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './Theteam.css' import imgperson01 from './images/partner01.png' import imgperson02 from './images/partner02.png' import imgfacebook from './images/facebook.png' import imginstagram from './images/instagram.png' import imgyoutube from './images/youtube.png' function Theteam() { return (

THE EXPERTS

T K Noushad

Expert in ecommerceMarketing
Sales/Business

A mastermind in business administration Competent in people management Expert in ecommerceMarketing Sales/Businessdevelopment strategy Phenomenon in Marketing strategy Vigorous in Investment Facilitation Versatile in effective leadership

K S Sunil Krishna

Certified Digital Marketing
Expert

MBA in Marketing & International Business Expertise in Creative direction & brand building Implementation of online strategy via advertising techniques Online Business development techniques Innovative ideation process implementation

) } export default Theteam
